page.title: 11CHILDREN'S LEISURE TIME.
page.content: IF YOU ARE A CHILD IN MELBOURNE WITH ANY FREE TIME FOR LEISURE AND RECREATION THERE ARE LOTS OF ACTIVITIES TO JOIN IN.THE FACILITIES INCLUDE A THRIVING YOUTH CLUB THAT OPENS 4 NIGHTS A WEEK,2 RECREATION FIELDS WITH SWINGS,SLIDES AND ROUNDABOUTS, LESSONS IN BALLET, TAP AND DISCO DANCING.SPORTS FACILITIES INCLUDE BADMINTON,TENNIS AND SQUASH COURTS,A CRICKET PITCH AND A LEARNER SWIMMING POOL.THERE IS A NEW SCOUT HEADQUARTERS FOR CUBS,BROWNIES, SCOUTS AND GIRL GUIDES IN PACKHORSE ROAD.FISHING IS A VERY POPULAR HOBBY AND CAN BE UNDERTAKEN EITHER AT MELBOURNE POOL OR AT STAUNTON HAROLD RESERVOIR.THERE IS ALSO A PRIVATE SAILING CLUB WHICH IS BASED AT THIS RESERVOIR.THERE ARE SEVERAL FOOTPATH WALKS THAT ARE MAPPED OUT AND ALSO A VERY GOOD LIBRARY FACILITY.
